name: REQUIEM MEMORY (TRIAL VERSION)
description:
REQUIEM MEMORY is a horror adventure game with Ryona elements.
Contains some strong language.





■ Various maps





■ Unique enemies
■ Revenge of Dead CG
■ Hidden traps

One day the girl is kidnapped
A girl kidnapped in a suspicious building uses objects around her to
I'm looking for a way out
While exploring, you encounter enemies and must run far away to avoid being caught by them.
I found a business card for an organization that enjoys killing for pleasure.
We get clues about them and learn about them little by little.
Control the girl and solve various puzzles to escape safely.
Play time is about 2 hours.
